content.raw:
Pull request #2515 has the same changes backported to gazebo7 and the ABI checker didn't complain.

I think there's no rush to merge pull request #2511 before the gazebo8 release. The reason that there are 2 pull requests is because merging forward the gazebo7 version isn't enough to get the tests to pass, due to things that are new in default.

I think there's no rush to merge pull request #2511 before the gazebo8 release. The reason that there are 2 pull requests is because merging forward the gazebo7 version isn't enough to get the tests to pass, due to things that are new in default.
